#BlackMagicCraft #Episode202 #warhammer40k

In this episode I make a drastic hobby change change and jump into Warhammer 40k, and start by painting my Plague Marines.

Thanks @Miscast for being the catalyst to start this inspiring change and for introducing me to 28 mag.

Check out @Miscast 's great Nurgle Diary series starting here: https://youtu.be/vyv9RK74eAM

Check out the incredible 28MAG: https://28-mag.com

Grabs some fancy paint brushes from @Squidmar Miniatures recent Kickstarter (late pledges still open): http://kck.st/2V2guez


---------------------------------------------------------------------

title: My Desperate Hobby Change - The Plague Marines & Warhammer 40k
